oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capbox of Pvt. William Henry Harrison Linzy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Confederate shield-front capbox belonged to Pvt. William Henry Harrison Linzy, Co. E, 11th Tenn. Inf., CSA, who said that it was "the only thing I got home with."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
